publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: CONVERGENCE AND SUPERCONVERGENCE OF HERMITE BICUBIC ELEMENT FOR EIGENVALUE PROBLEM OF THE BIHARMONIC EQUATION

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: In this paper, we discuss the convergence and superconvergence for eigenvalue problem of the biharmonic equation by using the Hermite bicubic element. Based on asymptotic error expansions and interpolation postprocessing, we gain the following estimation: 0 ≤ λ̅h - λ ≤ Cch8-ε where ε > 0 is an arbitrary small positive number and Cε > 0 is a constant.

Yang Yidu, A posteriori error estimates in Adini finite element for eigenvalue problems, Preprint.
Qun Lin, Ningning Yan, Aihui Zhou, A rectangle test for interpolated finite elements, Pro. of Sys. Sci. and Sys. Engng, Great wall Culture publish Co., Hong Kong, 1991, 217-229.
